src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? [start] LC : I 'd like to have a little coffee before seeing the doctor . [MASK] RP : Ah yes , that 's a good idea , so we 'll ... LC : Ok . LC : Is there a cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Ok , perfect . [MASK] RP : We 'll be able to have a coffee or something else . Does that suit you ? [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] RP : We 'll go slowly , we have time anyway . LC : Do you have to have coffee at the cafe ? ARI : No . LC : Ok. We 'll go straight to the counter . ARI : Yes of course . RP : Ok . RP : Let 's go then . LC : We 'll ask for coffee . LC : Yes , yes . LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . LC : Are there many people waiting in radiology ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Ok . RP : Ok , it 's clear . RP : So maybe we 'll go through the reception area again ? [MASK] LC : Yes , ok. [MASK] RP : We 're going to ask him how to get there . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Now I 'm a little bit lost , I do n't know which corridor we came from . LC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [end] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( reception ) ) RP : And which corridor to take to get to the reception ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day .

src: [start] ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? LC : Um hello , okay , I think we need to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] RP : Yes , I think that 's it . Ok , we 'll see if he can give us any information . LC : Mhm . RP : So do you want to ask him or do you want me to ? I 'll do it . RP : I 'd like to find the rheumatology ward . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , he told us to go to the building behind us , it 's the second door on the left . He 's giving us directions . That 's handy . There you go . [MASK] LC : Ok . [MASK] LC : Ok . RP : Well that 's it , we 've arrived . LC : Ok . Very good . RP : Do you want to ask him ? LC : Ok . [end] LC : Um ... [MASK] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . ARI : How can I help you ? LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard .
